question: She agreed ........ my proposal. (Choose the suitable preposition)
prashna: वह मेरे प्रस्ताव पर ........ सहमत हुई। (उपयुक्त पूर्वसर्ग चुनें)

question: He came home late .......... the evening. (Choose the suitable preposition)
prashna: वह शाम .......... देर से घर आया। (उपयुक्त पूर्वसर्ग चुनें)

question: Santosh deals .......... grains. (Choose the suitable preposition)
prashna: संतोष अनाज का व्यापार .......... करता है। (उपयुक्त पूर्वसर्ग चुनें)

question: We saw them quarrel. (Choose the most suitable passive voice)
prashna: हमने उन्हें झगड़ते देखा। (सबसे उपयुक्त कर्मवाच्य चुनें)

options.A: They were seen by we quarrel.
options.B: They were quarrelling as seen by us.
options.D: They were quarrelling seen by us.

vikalpa.A: They were seen by we quarrel.
vikalpa.B: They were quarrelling as seen by us.
vikalpa.D: They were quarrelling seen by us.

question: Choose the suitable meaning of the phrase: 'at the eleventh hour'
prashna: मुहावरे का उपयुक्त अर्थ चुनें: 'at the eleventh hour'

question: Choose the suitable meaning of the phrase: By hook or by crook
prashna: मुहावरे का उपयुक्त अर्थ चुनें: 'By hook or by crook'

options.A: to make possible by any means

vikalpa.A: किसी भी तरह से संभव बनाना

question: The General was killed. The army fled. (Choose the suitable combination of sentences)
prashna: जनरल मारा गया। सेना भाग गई। (वाक्यों का उपयुक्त संयोजन चुनें)

options.A: The General was killed because the army fled.
options.B: The General was killed and the army was fled.
options.C: The General was killed and so the army fled.
options.D: The army fled and, therefore the General was killed.

vikalpa.A: The General was killed because the army fled.
vikalpa.B: The General was killed and the army was fled.
vikalpa.C: The General was killed and so the army fled.
vikalpa.D: The army fled and, therefore the General was killed.

question: This is the book. He likes it most. (Choose the most suitable combination of sentences)
prashna: यह वही किताब है। वह इसे सबसे ज्यादा पसंद करता है। (वाक्यों का सबसे उपयुक्त संयोजन चुनें)

options.A: This is the book, so he likes it most.
options.B: This is the book, therefore he likes it most.
options.C: This is the book, because he likes it most.
options.D: This is the book which he likes most.

vikalpa.A: This is the book, so he likes it most.
vikalpa.B: This is the book, therefore he likes it most.
vikalpa.C: This is the book, because he likes it most.
vikalpa.D: This is the book which he likes most.

question: Choose the following word correctly spelt:
prashna: निम्नलिखित में से सही वर्तनी वाला शब्द चुनें:

question: They would succeed if they (try) (Choose the most suitable option)
prashna: वे सफल होते यदि उन्होंने (प्रयास किया होता) (सबसे उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

options.A: They would succeed if they would try.
options.B: They would succeed if they had tried.
options.C: They would succeed if they were trying.
options.D: They would succeed if they tried.

vikalpa.A: They would succeed if they would try.
vikalpa.B: They would succeed if they had tried.
vikalpa.C: They would succeed if they were trying.
vikalpa.D: They would succeed if they tried.

question: This girl never (see) the Taj Mahal. (Choose the most suitable option)
prashna: इस लड़की ने कभी ताज महल नहीं (देखा) है। (सबसे उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

options.A: This girl has never seen the Taj Mahal.
options.B: This girl is never seen the Taj Mahal.
options.C: This girl not see the Taj Mahal.
options.D: This girl has seen the Taj Mahal never.

vikalpa.A: This girl has never seen the Taj Mahal.
vikalpa.B: This girl is never seen the Taj Mahal.
vikalpa.C: This girl not see the Taj Mahal.
vikalpa.D: This girl has seen the Taj Mahal never.

question: We .......................there a week ago. (Fill the blank with the most suitable option)
prashna: हम एक हफ्ते पहले वहां .......................। (रिक्त स्थान को सबसे उपयुक्त विकल्प से भरें)

question: The students ................. when the teacher came into the classroom (Choose the suitable option)
prashna: जब शिक्षक कक्षा में आए तो छात्र ................. (उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

question: He is vexed ........... his neighbour. (Choose the most suitable option)
prashna: वह अपने पड़ोसी से ........... परेशान है। (सबसे उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

question: Yeats was ............ with great poetic talents. (Choose the most suitable option)
prashna: येट्स महान काव्य प्रतिभा से ............ थे। (सबसे उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

question: The writer of the piece 'On Letter Writing' is ................. (Choose the correct option)
prashna: 'On Letter Writing' लेख के लेखक ................. हैं (सही विकल्प चुनें)

question: Who talks about 'the leafy boughs'? (Choose the suitable option)
prashna: 'The leafy boughs' के बारे में कौन बात करता है? (उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

question: Letter writing was done more carefully in the ........ (Choose the most suitable option)
prashna: ........ में पत्र लेखन अधिक सावधानी से किया जाता था (सबसे उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

question: Wordsworth saw a host of daffodils beside the ........ (Choose the suitable option)
prashna: वर्ड्सवर्थ ने ........ के पास डैफोडिल्स का एक झुंड देखा (उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

question: Who wrote the poem 'Everyone Sang'? (Choose the suitable option)
prashna: 'Everyone Sang' कविता किसने लिखी थी? (उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

question: 'David Copperfield' is a novel about .................. psychology. (Choose the suitable option)
prashna: 'डेविड कॉपरफील्ड' .................. मनोविज्ञान के बारे में एक उपन्यास है। (उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

chapter_name: Journey to the End of the Earth
question: Who was David's early nurse? (Choose the suitable option)
prashna: डेविड की शुरुआती नर्स कौन थी? (उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

chapter_name: Journey to the End of the Earth
question: Who wrote the piece 'Robin'? (Choose the suitable option)
prashna: 'Robin' रचना किसने लिखी थी? (उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

chapter_name: Journey to the End of the Earth
question: The poet wants to go back to Innisfree because of .......... (Choose the suitable option)
prashna: कवि .......... के कारण इनिसफ्री वापस जाना चाहता है (उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

options.A: the fond memories of the place

question: The poem 'If' is addressed to ............
Answer any two, each in about 75 words of the following:
prashna: निम्नलिखित में से किन्हीं दो के उत्तर लगभग 75 शब्दों में दें:

sub_questions.a: Why are order and safety necessary for Civilization?
sub_questions.b: Why was the writer angry with the Photographer?
sub_questions.c: What does J. C. Hill say about truth?
sub_questions.d: How did the dalesman avoid the postal charges?
sub_questions.e: Why does the writer say that absent-mindedness may be a virtue?

anuprashna.a: सभ्यता के लिए व्यवस्था और सुरक्षा क्यों आवश्यक है?
anuprashna.b: लेखक फोटोग्राफर से क्यों नाराज था?
anuprashna.c: जे. सी. हिल सत्य के बारे में क्या कहते हैं?
anuprashna.d: डेल्समैन ने डाक शुल्क से कैसे बचा?
anuprashna.e: लेखक ऐसा क्यों कहता है कि भुलक्कड़पन एक गुण हो सकता है?

question: Show in about 75 words that you have read and understood one of the following poems:
prashna: लगभग 75 शब्दों में दिखाएं कि आपने निम्नलिखित कविताओं में से एक को पढ़ा और समझा है:

chapter_name: Journey to the End of the Earth
question: Discuss in about 75 words the childhood of David Copperfield.
prashna: लगभग 75 शब्दों में डेविड कॉपरफील्ड के बचपन की चर्चा करें।

question: Discuss in about 75 words the character of Uriah Heep or Agnes Wickfield.
prashna: लगभग 75 शब्दों में उरिया हीप या एग्नेस विकफील्ड के चरित्र की चर्चा करें।

question: Write a paragraph in about 75 words on one of the following:
prashna: निम्नलिखित में से किसी एक पर लगभग 75 शब्दों में एक अनुच्छेद लिखें:

sub_questions.c: Pen is mightier than the sword.

anuprashna.c: कलम तलवार से अधिक शक्तिशाली है।
